title: Change of Heart
description: Millions of adoring fans. Loving and devoted parents. Fantastic friends. The world belongs to Asia Pierce.At least she thinks so.There is only one thing that eludes the girl that has it all; unconditional and everlasting love. Asia wants what every woman wants...a fairytale romance. And Asia always gets what she wants.With three men vying for her heart, Asia has to choose. Which one can she trust? Who will love her the most?The answer is right in front of her, but will years of bad judgement and one bad romance cloud her judgement? Will one more bad decision cause her to miss out on the best thing that has ever happened to her?
author: Jackie Chanel
